CustomField.formula: IF( NOT( ISBLANK(Bill_Document_Content_Version_ID__c) ) && $Label.Company_Name = 'BlueWave', HYPERLINK("/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/download/"&Bill_Document_Content_Version_ID__c,"View Statement","_self"), IF(NOT( ISBLANK(Bill_Document_Content_Version_ID__c) ) && $Label.Company_Name <> 'BlueWave', HYPERLINK($Label.Customer_Member_Portal_URL + "sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/download/"&Bill_Document_Content_Version_ID__c,"View Statement","_self"), "Statement Coming Soon") )
CustomField.label: Statement
